history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00701
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING ALEXANDRA M. EALA FOR WINNING IN THE 2020 AUSTRALIAN OPEN - JUNIOR GIRL DOUBLES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TIANGCO, JOHN REYNALD M.
DATE FILED : 2020-02-05
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2020-03-04
          -The body directed the Secretariat to prepare a resolution, in substitution to HR Nos. 701, 708 and 740, including its corresponding committee report.
          -Initial deliberation of House Resolution Nos. 701, 708 and 740 (Commending Alexandra M. Eala for winning the first junior grand slam title in 2020 Australian Open)
MOTHER BILL: HR00783
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT ON 2020-02-10
